SELECT t.TRADE_ID AS tradeId, t.TRADE_NO AS tradeNo, DATE_FORMAT(t.TRADE_DATE, '%Y-%m-%d %T') AS tradeDate, p.ITEM_NAME AS itemName, q.SELLER_NAME AS sellerName FROM basis_tb_trade t, basis_tb_item p, basis_tb_seller q WHERE t.ITEM_ID= p.ITEM_ID AND p.SELLER_ID= q.SELLER_ID
ORDER BY TRADE_ID desc
ORDER BY $sort$ $order$
LIMIT $limit$ OFFSET $offset$
